description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Flitch of Bacon: or, the Custom of Dunmow. A tale of English home. With illustrations by John Gilbert.]" Author: Ainsworth, William Harrison Contributor: Gilbert, John - Sir Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12620.ee.28." Page: 118 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1874 Publisher: G. Routledge & Sons Edition: New edition, with illustrations by Sir John Gilbert. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000034852 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
